alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 10:50PM EST until January 10 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast to south winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts as high as 40 to 55 mph expected late tonight through midday Tuesday. Locally stronger gusts are possible tonight and early Tuesday morning in locations immediately downwind of Black and Pine Mountains. After a lull in the winds Tuesday afternoon, winds will turn southwesterly and increase to between 15 and 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected Tuesday evening through early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Harlan and Letcher Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
